com.vmware.vcenter.trusted_infrastructure.trust_authority_hosts

Interface Attestation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AttestationTypes, com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService, com.vmware.vapi.bindings.Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AttestationStub

    public interface Attestation
extends com.vmware.vapi.bindings.Service, AttestationTypes, com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService
    The Attestation interface contains information necessary to connect to the hosts running Attestation Service. This interface was added in vSphere API 7.0.0.0.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Attestation.GetInvocation
      Invocable that represents the Attestation#get vAPI operation.
      static interface  Attestation.ListInvocation
      Invocable that represents the Attestation#list vAPI operation.

      • Fields inherited from interface com.vmware.vcenter.trusted_infrastructure.trust_authority_hosts.AttestationTypes

        _VAPI_SERVICE_ID

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Attestation.GetInvocation get(java.lang.String host)
      Returns the connection info about the Attestation Service running on the specified host.
      Attestation.ListInvocation list()
      Returns a list of the hosts running a Attestation Service matching the specified AttestationTypes.FilterSpec.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        Attestation.GetInvocation get(java.lang.String host)
        Returns the connection info about the Attestation Service running on the specified host. This method was added in vSphere API 7.0.0.0.

        Invocation Result:
        The AttestationTypes.Info instance which contains the information necessary to connect to the Attestation Service.

        Parameters:
        host - @{link com.vmware.vcenter.Host} id. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: HostSystem.
        Returns:
        instance of Attestation.GetInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described get operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        Error - if service's TLS certificate chain is not valid.
        NotFound - if host doesn't match to any Host.
        ResourceInaccessible - if connection to host failed.
        Unauthenticated - if the user can not be authenticated.
        Unauthorized - if you do not have all of the privileges described as follows:
        • Method execution requires TrustedAdmin.ReadTrustedHosts.
        • The resource HostSystem referenced by the parameter host requires System.View.

      • list

        Attestation.ListInvocation list()
        Returns a list of the hosts running a Attestation Service matching the specified AttestationTypes.FilterSpec. This method was added in vSphere API 7.0.0.0.

        Invocation Result:
        List of AttestationTypes.Summary of Attestation Services.

        Returns:
        instance of Attestation.ListInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described list operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        Error - if there is a generic error.
        InvalidArgument - if the response data will exceed the message limit.
        Unauthenticated - if the user can not be authenticated.
        Unauthorized - if you do not have all of the privileges described as follows:
        • Method execution requires TrustedAdmin.ReadTrustedHosts.
        • The resource HostSystem referenced by the property AttestationTypes.FilterSpec.getHosts() requires System.View.
        • The resource ClusterComputeResource referenced by the property AttestationTypes.FilterSpec.getClusters() requires System.View.
